title: Batgirl 022 (2013) (Tablet Edition)
description:
This is from the original scanner. I adjusted the resolution and 

compressed the file for easier reading on tablets and ereaders. I 

have added 'Tablet Edition' to the name to avoid confusion.

Enjoy and please seed back.


Batgirl 22

By:   	Gail Simone, Fernando Pasarin, Alex Garner	
Type:   	Comics
Genres:   	Superhero
Series:   	Batgirl
Publisher:   	DC Comics	
Pub. Date:  	July 10, 2013


Following the recent massive trauma she's suffered, Barbara Gordon 

tries to move on with her life-without Batgirl!
